message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I estimate its value to be $12000 to me. Considering its worth to you is $8000, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This is an opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
